attributes.action: Decrease crime figures in London Hackney.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we are looking to reduce many factors that are putting people in the area under threat, it has been estimated more crimes have taken place in hackney then in many other boroughs. These factors are 
Drug offences
Fraud and forgery 
Offences against vehicles 
Other offences 
Other theft offences 
Robbery  
Sexual offences 
Violence against the person

rejection.details: Please contact the Greater London Authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
